00074       void start(std::string streams) {
00075         boost::asio::spawn(strand_,
00076                            boost::bind(&connection::do_start,
00077                                        shared_from_this(), streams, _1));
00078         // start the deadline actor
00079         boost::asio::spawn(strand_,
00080                            boost::bind(&connection::check_deadline,
00081                                        shared_from_this(), _1));

00083       void do_start(std::string streams, boost::asio::yield_context yield) {
00084         std::string response(send_request(str(boost::format("GET %s") % streams)));
00085         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("connect_to response: '%s' '%s'") % response % streams));
00086         ASSERT_THROW(response == "OK");
00087         boost::asio::spawn(strand_,
00088                            boost::bind(&connection::receive_data,
00089                                        shared_from_this(), _1));
00090         boost::asio::spawn(strand_,
00091                            boost::bind(&connection::heartbeat,
00092                                        shared_from_this(), _1));
00093       }

00102       // blocking "ls"
00103       std::set<std::string> ls() {
00104         ASSERT_THROW(!stopped_ && socket_.is_open());
00105 
00106         std::set<std::string> streams;
00107         std::istringstream iss(send_request("LIST"));
00108         std::string     stream_name;
00109         boost::uint32_t stream_number;
00110         bool ok(true);
00111         while (ok) {
00112           if (iss >> stream_name) {
00113             if (iss >> stream_number) {
00114               if (stream_name != "")
00115                 streams.insert(stream_name);
00116             } else ok= false;
00117           } else ok= false;
00118         }
00119         return streams;
00120       }

00157       // blocking connect
00158       bool connect_socket(std::string host,
00159                           std::string port) {
00160         using boost::asio::ip::tcp;
00161         tcp::resolver resolver(io_service());
00162         const tcp::resolver::query query(host, port);
00163         tcp::resolver::iterator endpoint_iterator(resolver.resolve(query));
00164         tcp::resolver::iterator end;
00165         boost::system::error_code error(boost::asio::error::host_not_found);
00166         while (error && endpoint_iterator != end) {
00167           socket_.close();
00168           socket_.connect(*endpoint_iterator++, error);
00169           LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("error(connect)= '%s'") % error));
00170         }
00171         return (!error) || (endpoint_iterator != end);
00172       }

00174       // data processing
00175       void receive_data(boost::asio::yield_context yield) {
00176         try {      
00177           while (1) {
00178             deadline_.expires_from_now(boost::posix_time::seconds(10));
00179             const std::size_t n_header(boost::asio::async_read
00180                                        (socket_, boost::asio::buffer(&header_, sizeof(protocol::header)), yield));
00181             if (!socket_.is_open()) // timeout
00182               throw std::runtime_error("async_read timeout");
00183             ASSERT_THROW(n_header == sizeof(network::protocol::header));
00184           
00185             if (header_.length() >= data_buffer_.size())
00186               LOG_ERROR(str(boost::format("header: %s H: %d D: %d") % header_ % header_.length() % data_buffer_.size()));
00187             ASSERT_THROW(header_.length() < data_buffer_.size());
00188           
00189             deadline_.expires_from_now(boost::posix_time::seconds(10));
00190             const std::size_t n_data(boost::asio::async_read
00191                                      (socket_, boost::asio::buffer(&data_buffer_, header_.length()), yield));
00192             if (!socket_.is_open()) // timeout
00193               throw std::runtime_error("async_read timeout");
00194             ASSERT_THROW(n_data == header_.length());
00195 
00196             if (header_.id() == broadcaster::directory::id()) {
00197               broadcaster::directory new_directory;
00198               new_directory.update(header_.length(), data_buffer_.data());
00199               directory_update(new_directory);
00200               std::swap(new_directory, directory_);
00201             } else {
00202               // dump all wav streams
00203               const std::string str_name(directory().stream_name_of(header().stream_number()));
00204               if (header().id() == "WAV_0000")
00205                 dump_wav(header().approx_ptime(), str_name, data_buffer_.begin(), data_buffer_.begin()+header_.length());
00206             
00207               LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("___ process: %s h='%s'") % str_name % header_));
00208 
00209               // process data samples in a method overwritten in a derived class
00210               process(data_buffer_.begin(), data_buffer_.begin()+header_.length());
00211             }
00212           }
00213         } catch (std::exception& e) {
00214           LOG_ERROR(e.what());
00215         }
00216       }

00218       // blocking send request, returns the response
00219       std::string send_request(std::string request) {
00220         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("send_request: '%s'") % request));
00221         request += "\r\n";
00222         boost::asio::streambuf request_streambuf;
00223         std::ostream request_stream(&request_streambuf);
00224         request_stream << request;
00225         boost::asio::write(socket_, request_streambuf);
00226         boost::asio::streambuf response_streambuf;
00227         boost::asio::read_until(socket_, response_streambuf, "\r\n");
00228 
00229         std::istream buffer(&response_streambuf);
00230         std::stringstream string_buffer;    
00231         buffer >> string_buffer.rdbuf();
00232 
00233         std::string response(string_buffer.str());
00234         response.erase(response.find_last_not_of("\r\n")+1);
00235 
00236         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("response: '%s'") % response));
00237         return response;
00238       }

00240       void check_deadline(boost::asio::yield_context yield) {
00241         try {
00242           while (socket_.is_open()) {
00243             if (stopped_)
00244               return;
00245             boost::system::error_code ignored_ec;
00246             deadline_.async_wait(yield[ignored_ec]);
00247             if (deadline_.expires_from_now() <= boost::posix_time::seconds(0))
00248               socket_.close();
00249           }
00250         } catch (std::exception& e) {
00251           LOG_ERROR(e.what());
00252         }
00253       }
00254 
00255       void heartbeat(boost::asio::yield_context yield) {
00256         try {
00257           while (socket_.is_open()) {
00258             if (stopped_)
00259               return;
00260             heartbeat_timer_.expires_from_now(boost::posix_time::seconds(1));        
00261             const size_t n(boost::asio::async_write
00262                            (socket_, boost::asio::buffer(&tick_buffer_, sizeof(tick_buffer_)), yield));
00263             ASSERT_THROW(n == sizeof(tick_buffer_));
00264             tick_buffer_ = (tick_buffer_ != 'z') ? tick_buffer_+1 : 'a';
00265         
00266             boost::system::error_code ignored_ec;
00267             heartbeat_timer_.async_wait(yield[ignored_ec]);
00268             if (deadline_.expires_from_now() <= boost::posix_time::seconds(0))
00269               socket_.close();        
00270           }
00271         } catch (std::exception& e) {
00272           LOG_ERROR(e.what());
00273         }
00274       }
